content: * **Check-in at Shrines regularly to see new stock.** New items become available after clearing areas of taking down bosses. It's especially important to stop in at Shrines are big fights to see what new Armor and Equipment is available.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Essential_Tips_and_Tricks.md', within the main section titled 'Essential Tips and Tricks', specifically from the subsection 'General Tips'.
The content is as follows:
* **Check-in at Shrines regularly to see new stock.** New items become available after clearing areas of taking down bosses. It's especially important to stop in at Shrines are big fights to see what new Armor and Equipment is available.
